ygData.subject: Re: Re: Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouln t waste the diamond.  I was at the ogres last night with my shaman, and all 3 of the ogres say this: gimme Duffeenitey rocks, me ---- em gud! With
ygData.messageBody:
I wouln't waste the diamond. I was at the ogres last night with my
shaman, and all 3 of the ogres say this:

"gimme Duffeenitey rocks, me ---- em gud!"

With the ---- replaced by crush, grind, etc. Perhaps the gnome in Rathe
Mountains will be a better bet...

Finkin
Gnome Magician of Xegony

Lomack wrote:

> I have talked to a GM that gave me a very cryptic response when I
> asked about Diamond Dust. But everything I can tell leads me to
> believe that these Ogres are the ones that can make Diamonds into
> Diamond Dust. If I had one Diamond I would try it. Unfortunately
> Diamonds just don't drop that often. :(
> Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCKMaster of Recruitingwww.bck.org"The
> Crimson Knights"Fennin Ro
